name: Login with username containing spaces
description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with a username containing spaces.
steps: Step 1: Enter a username containing spaces into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a valid password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: The login attempt should fail.
Expected result 2: An error message might be displayed indicating an invalid username format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
